ch0028_40_ibuki/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, you’re here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I hope you’re prepared for our training!
ch0028_40_ibuki/0101_0701_02_10:
Can you keep up with my energy? If you’re slow,
I’ll leave you behind!
ch0028_40_ibuki/7101_0701_01_10: Look! How do you find my outfit?
ch0028_40_ibuki/7101_0701_02_10: Switching up my look helps me stay focused!
ch0028_40_ibuki/7101_0701_03_10: I can sense my Pokémon are really fired up, too!
ch0028_40_ibuki/7102_0701_01_10:
I take pride in my usual outfit as a
dragon master...
ch0028_40_ibuki/7102_0701_02_10:
but I also feel as proud wearing this traditional
Johto outfit.
ch0028_40_ibuki/7103_0701_01_10:
We dragon masters go through training that’s much
harsher than that of other Trainers!
ch0028_40_ibuki/7103_0701_02_10:
If you’re curious about how we train, why not join
me next time?
ch0028_40_ibuki/7103_0701_03_10:
Only if you’re confident that you can keep
up, though!
ch0028_40_ibuki/7104_0701_01_10:
Dragon masters have made a name for themselves
in different regions.
ch0028_40_ibuki/7104_0701_02_10:
I know of some dragon masters who are also
teachers or musicians.
ch0028_40_ibuki/7104_0701_03_10:
Heh. It just proves that dragon masters are
excellent Trainers!
ch0028_40_ibuki/7105_0701_01_10:
When mastering a skill, you won’t get far if you
only practice the same thing over and over again.
ch0028_40_ibuki/7105_0701_02_10:
You’ll notice a stark difference between someone
who’s experienced new things and someone
who hasn’t.
ch0028_40_ibuki/7105_0701_03_10:
That’s why you should keep taking on new
challenges, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0028_40_ibuki/1701_0702_01_10:
You better be grateful! It’s rare for me to give
gifts, you know!
ch0028_40_ibuki/2501_0701_01_10:
Drampa are kind Pokémon, but if you make them
angry, they can get out of control...
ch0028_40_ibuki/2501_0701_02_10:
They’re clever, but there’s a hidden temper there!
That’s why dragon Pokémon are so hard to raise.
ch0028_40_ibuki/2501_0701_03_10:
Well, I’ve got a trusting bond with my
Drampa, regardless!
ch0028_40_ibuki/2501_0702_01_10:
Dragon Pokémon are the strongest, so they really
put Trainers to the test!
ch0028_40_ibuki/2501_0702_02_10:
You should take a moment to see how exceptional
I am!
ch0028_40_ibuki/2511_0701_01_10:
In Blackthorn City, there’s a training ground called
the Dragon’s Den.
ch0028_40_ibuki/2511_0701_02_10: I’ve dedicated a lot of time training there.
ch0028_40_ibuki/2511_0701_03_10: I bet you wouldn’t be able to handle it!
ch0028_40_ibuki/2511_0702_01_10:
It’s really hard to prove that you have the skills
and spirit of a worthy Trainer at the Dragon’s Den!
ch0028_40_ibuki/2511_0702_02_10: Do you have what it takes to gain approval there?
ch0028_40_ibuki/2511_0702_03_10:
Well...I actually haven’t gotten that approval yet,
either...
ch0028_40_ibuki/3001_0701_01_10:
I like the cold air in the morning. It helps me focus
and get ready for the day.
ch0028_40_ibuki/3003_0701_01_10:
Of course the world’s best dragon master has a
luxurious lunch as well! *chuckle* Are you
jealous?
ch0028_40_ibuki/3005_0701_01_10: My, you’re up late. I see you’re working hard.
